FuncDef: The display inventory command displays inventory information about a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify net-Element ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display inventory command displays inventory information about a device.
The display inventory device ne-id ne-id command is used to display information based on the standard format. The information includes the device type, device name, NE ID, interface IP address (in encrypted mode), and NE version.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
